item.title: The Verge guide to Amazon’s October Prime Day event
item.description:
For the third year in a row, Amazon is ringing in the fall with a second Prime Day event. This year’s two-day shopping event — dubbed Prime Big Deal Days — kicks off today, October 8th, and runs through tomorrow, October 9th, giving Amazon Prime subscribers a chance to chip away at their holiday wishlist before Black Friday and Cyber Monday land later this year.

Amazon already has a glut of great deals on offer, and we’re seeing steep discounts on Amazon’s own devices, including Fire tablets, Echo speakers, Eero routers, Kindles, and more. The online retailer is also slashing prices on a variety of other electronics, from noise-canceling headphones and earbuds to video doorbells and some of our favorite robot vacuums.

As usual, we’ll be...

Continue reading…
item.dc:creator: The Verge Staff

item.title: Tata Tech & BMW Group launch BMW TechWorks India JV to drive automotive innovation; operations to start in Nov
item.description: Tata Technologies and BMW Group have launched BMW TechWorks India, a joint venture aimed at innovation in automotive technology and business IT. The venture, starting with 100 employees, will rapidly scale to a four-digit workforce by 2025, focusing on India’s top engineering talent. It aims to develop next-gen software solutions for vehicles.

item.title: Gropyus plans to use robots to help rebuild Ukraine better and faster
item.description:
Construction tech startup Groypus has raised $100 million to scale up its factory that uses robots to make buildings 30% faster than traditional methods.

item.title: US House panel probes FCC decision to deny Starlink nearly $900 million
Lucid beats quarterly deliveries estimate as price discounts boost demand
Hurry to save 50% on the Holy Stone HS175D quadcopter drone
item.description: The Holy Stone HS175D RC quadcopter drone is on sale at Amazon for $135.99, down from the list price of $269.99. That's a 50% discount.

item.title: October Prime Day is here — here are all the best deals to shop so far
item.description: Prime Big Deal Days, Amazon's "October Prime Day" sale, is live through Wednesday. We've found the best deals on all sorts of tech, from Apple devices to robot vacuums and beyond.

item.title: Roomba models, explained: The guide to deciding which Roomba to buy on Prime Day
item.description: What's the best Roomba to buy when most of them are on sale for Prime Day? We break down the best iRobot vacuums for every floor type and budget.

item.title: Shop the best smartphone deals during October Prime Day — including an offer to get the new iPhone for just one penny
item.description: Prime Big Deal Days has officially landed, and with it comes all the deals. This includes smartphone savings on iPhones (including a Boost Mobile offer to get the iPhone 16 for just one penny), Samsung Galaxy, and Google Pixel devices. Here are the best deals to shop now.
